Uses of Interface
enigma.console.Console

Packages that use Console
enigma.console Provides text-mode support classes, most notably Console and TextWindow. 
enigma.console.remote An implementation of Console which allows its display to be sent over a network. 
enigma.console.terminal Provides terminal emulation classes to be used with Console. 
enigma.core Provides core Enigma classes used (knowingly or unknowingly) by every program running under Enigma. 
 

Uses of Console in enigma.console
 

Classes in enigma.console that implement Console
 class DefaultConsoleImpl
          A concrete Console implementation which hooks up to an arbitrary TextWindow for its low-level functionality.
 

Uses of Console in enigma.console.remote
 

Classes in enigma.console.remote that implement Console
 class RemoteConsoleServer
          An invisible Console which sends its data over streams to be displayed in a RemoteConsoleClient.
 

Constructors in enigma.console.remote with parameters of type Console
RemoteConsoleClient(Console console, InputStream remoteServerIn, OutputStream remoteServerOut)
           
 

Uses of Console in enigma.console.terminal
 

Fields in enigma.console.terminal declared as Console
protected  Console AnsiOutputStream.console
          The Console that this stream is managing.
 

Constructors in enigma.console.terminal with parameters of type Console
AnsiOutputStream(Console console)
          Constructs a new AnsiOutputStream which will display its output on the given Console.
 

Uses of Console in enigma.core
 

Methods in enigma.core that return Console
static Console Enigma.getConsole()
          Returns the Console associated with the current virtual machine.
static Console Enigma.getConsole(String title)
          Returns the Console associated with the current virtual machine.
 

Methods in enigma.core with parameters of type Console
static void Enigma.installConsole(Console console)
          Installs the specified Console as the current virtual machine's default Console.
